name: The Mystery of Alchemy
description:
Warning:The game is unfinished and in development. Player now can just  walk around in gameplay.

Long time ago, Our cute but a little gloomy hero Ethan was following one of the great alchemist  in the world Marx studying alchemy.

one day Ethan found that his master had gone  for a trip and left him with a letter and an emerald tablet on which had these confusing words: "As above,so below".

The letter from Marx said that the no-one-know great mystery of alchemy was hidden in those words, and the villagers were of great help of finding out the meaning. 

In order to find out the mystery, Ethan began his adventure. By talking and helping the villagers Ethan was more and more getting close to the mystery. 

Throughout the adventure, Ethan finally understood the  paraphrase  of words on the emerald tablet.

It's a narrative game with some puzzles, and  a cozy walk-arround.
